articles.description: Google does everything in the cloud and has for a long time. That makes me wonder why it took so long to see some of Chrome OS' newest features.
articles.content: Chromebooks are now 10 years old and Google recognized the milestone with an announcement about some features that a lot of us have been wanting for a while. Some, like an expanded clipboard that can… [+3579 chars]

articles.title: Realme X7 Review: A no-nonsense budget 5G smartphone - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Is this the best smartphone under Rs 20,000?
articles.content: The Realme X7 series first made its debut early in December, bringing two new 5G devices in the mid-range. While the Realme X7 Pro focused on the premium mid-range segment, the vanilla X7 was designe… [+6923 chars]
